thread.title: Video: Sounders defender Chad Marshall on his practice-field injury and ‘blessed’ recovery
thread.title_full: Video: Sounders defender Chad Marshall on his practice-field injury and ‘blessed’ recovery | The Seattle Times

author: Matt Pentz
title: Video: Sounders defender Chad Marshall on his practice-field injury and ‘blessed’ recovery
text:
Sounders defender Chad Marshall spoke to the media on Friday for the first time since leaving Starfire Sports Complex in an ambulance two weeks ago with what was later diagnosed as a neck sprain.
“To be back here in two weeks in full training,” Marshall said Friday after practice, “I feel very lucky, very blessed.”
Matt Pentz : 206-464-3184 or mpentz@seattletimes.com ; on Twitter: @mattpentz . Matt Pentz covers Sounders FC, Reign FC, MLS and world soccer for The Seattle Times throughout the year.
